name: TRELLIX AX [Malware-Object]
description: This rule looks for events generated by Trellix Malware Analysis (AX) appliances.
query: class:fireeye* product=mas NOT virus:/(\b|_)apt(\b|_)/ NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX AX [APT Malware-Object]
description: This rule looks for APT-related events generated by Trellix Malware Analysis (AX) appliances.

name: TRELLIX FX [Malware-Object]
description: This rule looks for events generated by Trellix File Protect (FX) appliances.
query: class:fireeye* product=fmps NOT virus:/(\b|_)apt(\b|_)/ NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX FX [APT Malware-Object]
description: This rule looks for APT-related events generated by Trellix File Protect (FX) appliances.

name: TRELLIX DAAS [<%= signature %>]
description: This rule looks for malicious alerts found using Trellix Detection as a Service (formerly known as Detection on Demand).
